sentences.en: Giving every patient an annual anti - flu injection would be prohibitively expensive.
sentences.cn: 每年给每个病人注射 抗 流感针剂的花费是无法承受的.

sentences.en: Now, the costs of devaluing appear prohibitively high.
sentences.cn: 现在, 贬值货币的代价看起来高得让人望而怯步.

sentences.en: Real - estate prices in downtown Manhattan looked prohibitively expensive.
sentences.cn: 市中心曼哈顿的房地产价格贵得使人望而生畏.

sentences.en: When you add it all up it's prohibitively expensive.

words.tran_cn: 禁止的，禁止性的；抑制的；（费用，价格等）过高的；类同禁止的
禁止；禁令；禁酒；诉讼中止令
